                    String name,
                    String type,
                    JoinType joinType,
                    String joinParam,
                    boolean isStart,
                    String guard,
                    List<Object> customList)
Description copied from interface: GraphFactory
Creates a new Node.

Parameters:
graph - The graph which the node is part of
name - The node name
type - The node type
joinType - The node's join type
joinParam - The node's join parameter.
isStart - Indicates whether the node is a start node
guard - The node guard
customList - A list of custom attributes from the process definition. May be empty or null.
Returns:
The new Node

                               NodeToken previousToken)
Description copied from interface: GraphFactory
Generates a new ArcToken for the given GraphProcess, pointing to the given Arc.

Parameters:
process - The GraphProcess which the new ArcToken will belong to
arc - The Arc the new ArcToken is being placed on
executionType - The ExecutionType represented by this arc token.
previousToken - The NodeToken which preceded this ArcToken.

A new ArcToken

newNodeToken

public HibNodeToken newNodeToken(GraphProcess process,
                                 Node node,
                                 ExecutionType executionType,
                                 List<ArcToken> parents,
                                 NodeToken envSource)
Description copied from interface: GraphFactory
Generates a new NodeToken for the given GraphProcess, pointing to the given Node.

Parameters:
process - The GraphProcess which the new NodeToken will belong to
node - The Node the new NodeToken is being placed on
executionType - The ExecutionType represented by this node token.
parents - The list of ArcTokens which preceded this NodeToken
envSource - The token who's parents the new token should take its environment from. This means the new token will have the same starting environment as the passed in token.
Returns:
A new NodeToken

newProcess

public HibGraphProcess newProcess(Graph graph)
Description copied from interface: GraphFactory
Generates a new GraphProcess for the given Graph. Execution of the process is not started by this method. The method will be used by Engine.startProcess(Graph).

Parameters:
graph - The Graph the GraphProcess will be executing.
Returns:
A new GraphProcess

newNestedProcess

public GraphProcess newNestedProcess(Graph graph,
                                     NodeToken parentToken)
Description copied from interface: GraphFactory
Generates a new GraphProcess for the given Graph. Execution of the process is not started by this method. This method is specfically for created a new nested process.

Parameters:
graph - The Graph the GraphProcess will be executing.
parentToken - The NodeToken whose execution is causing this nested process to be created.
Returns:
A new GraphProcess

                            String name,
                            int maxMemberIndex)
Description copied from interface: GraphFactory
Creates a new token set.

Parameters:
process - The process that the token set belongs to
name - The name given to the token set
maxMemberIndex - The maximum member index (which should equals the number of initial members in the set)
Returns:
The newly created token set

addType

public void addType(String type,
                    Class<? extends Node> clazz)
Description copied from interface: GraphFactory
Adds the type to the GraphFactory for this engine. Specifies what class will be used for a given node type, when loading process definitions from XML file.

Specified by:
addType in interface GraphFactory
Overrides:
addType in class AbstractGraphFactory
Parameters:
type - The type identifier, as used in the process definition file
clazz - The node class which will be instantiated for this type
